CreateDedicatedClusterDBInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mariadb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDedicatedClusterDBInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DbVersionId": "xx",
    "VpcId": "",
    "DcnInstanceId": "xx",
    "Zone": "xx",
    "GoodsNum": 0,
    "ProjectId": 1,
    "SecurityGroupIds": [
        "xx"
    ],
    "Pid": 0,
    "DcnRegion": "xx",
    "Machine": "xx",
    "Storage": 0,
    "ResourceTags": [
        {
            "TagKey": "xx",
            "TagValue": "xx"
        }
    ],
    "Manual": 0,
    "Memory": 0,
    "SubnetId": "",
    "DeviceNo": "xx",
    "ClusterId": "xx",
    "InstanceName": "xx"
}
CreateDedicatedClusterDBInstance.title: input demo1

FlushBinlog.document:
当需要最新的binlog文件时，该api相当于在mysqld中执行flush logs。
后台切分binlog并自动上传到cos，展示在控制台实例binlog列表里，用户可下载。
FlushBinlog.title: 切分Binlog
